commit.message:
re PR c++/60345 (r208159 causes Firefox build error)

	PR c++/60345
	Revert:
	DR 1571
	* call.c (reference_binding): Recurse on user-defined conversion.
	(convert_like_real) [ck_ref_bind]: Explain cv-qual mismatch.

From-SVN: r208175
